> is the department or all function of arthas fit to combine with apm ?

What do you mean department? What department? What do you mean combine with APM?
Totally confused.

Your description is wrong. Trace segment is SkyWalking protocol and daya structure. We have nothing related to opentracing, except the toolkit to provide some compatible APIs only. We have clear protocol document to describe ours.

Our protocol is designed for APM, Zipkin is especially for tracing. We have much difference.

opentracing toolkit is providing limited APIs for users to interact with the agent.

Additional this is how histogram storage in the elasticsearch

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5441976/80341222-9d129700-8894-11ea-8e68-86fe7b80eb9d.png)
My guess, you open `elasticsearch` as storage, but use `*-es7` binary tar.

> My guess, you open `elasticsearch` as storage, but use `*-es7` binary tar.

I did a test : curl http:127.0.0.1:9200
and response info shows like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57666663/80346781-def40b00-889d-11ea-9dd9-dc7a2a2d0543.png)
I mean SkyWalking tar, not ElasticSearch. We have 2 binary tars, one for es6, the other for es7. Please check our document and download page.
yes, I use es7 binary tar. I thought it can compatible with es6. Thank you，>_<.
First, there is no 8.0, then this is going to be removed in the official release.
Very thanks for your response.  In other words，now master branch is just a dev branch and this ui problem will be corrected in release version. It’s right?
No, this is not a bug. The brief visualization is abandoned. You will not see this on our UI anymore.
After the DM discussion, this is not an issue, just an idea. Not suitable to be list here.
OK, it make sense and looking forward to new version and new UI to release. Thanks again for your work
I also have same problem，How to resolve?

> Upgrade nacos version to 1.2.0
